data.text: «Gè tɔgi zeini gàazuʋɛ ma
Ni naa laade, leeni ɠa nà la sɔlɔɔ faa maaɓɔun
Tɔɔzei maanɔɠɔi la makɛni telebotala nuiti bɛ ɓaa,
GALA ge la sìɛ ʋelei ʋɛtɛsu nɛi ɓaa?
«Zɛɛi ɠa nɛi gè ɠɛa ziɛzu su?
GALA ge kɔ̀ɠɔ telebo kilo ɠa,
Ni kɔ̀ɠɔi zeɠeni pele ʋagɔi ma,
naazu nii gè fazasu, taɠili ge naa mi,
Ni gè looni anzanu lɛga zu,
naazu ànzai boti ɠɛ nu ɠili bɛ,
Mazɔlɔɔ maaɓoo vaa ɠana, ɲamaba vaa ɠana,
Nà-faaɠaazagi a la ɠɛ ga abui, a la gàla, eyɛsu é kòloɠolo,
«Nà-botiɠɛ zunui ta, ɓaa nà-botiɠɛ anzanui ta, a la ɓaazaɠana mà,
Ni naa laade, leeni ɠa nà kɛ, siɛgi zu GALA ge wuzeɠezu la ga é tùkpɔ?
Zɔi é kpɛ̀tɛai dèe ɠoozu, tɔun taade é ʋa ti ɓɛtɛ ɓalaa ɓaa?
«Yeelɛ ɠa gè ɠɛlɛni la maawɔin nui ná-kpɔba vaa ʋa,
Anɠɛ nɛi nà ɠila ka gè ɠɛni nà-daamianigi miizu,
Tɔun é zo mà loungo ziɛgi zu ma,
Kaipa gè maawɔin nu ɠaa ʋɛ, gè zɛ seɠe ʋalagi zu,
Ɓa-o, tɔun ti ɠɛni tuya loozu bɛ̀,
Ni nà ɠɛna podoun maaluani tukpɔɠaaleʋezuʋɛ
kpàkigi ɠula pòluzaamaʋɛ ʋa,
Mazɔlɔɔ nà luazu maanɔɠɔi ʋa, nii GALA ge teʋeni,
«Gè ɠitoni nɛi zanugi ʋa? Ɓaa gè ɠɛ ma: ‹Dɔ̀ɔɠuzuʋɛ ɠa!›
Gè la ɠɛni ɠoozunɛɛni nɔ zèaɠɔligiti mɔin vai zu,
Siɛgi zu gè foloi ʋɛtɛni da, é ɗa volo ná-keɠaaɓaai zu,
gè ɠakani zìimaʋɛ dɔɔɠuzu,
Kaka faa ɠana, nii maanɛai é lukpɔ.
«Yeelɛ ɠa gè ɠɛni ɠoozunɛɛzu la, ga gè sìli nui ɠaa dɔai maanɔɠɔi zu,
nɛ̀i gè la vaani bu pɛ nɛ̀gi ʋa koto ɠɛ,
Ɓɛ ɠa gè la kɔnɔkulani ga suai, é ʋa yiɠo?
Wɛɛn la ɲiini etea,
Eɠɛʋelei nuɓusɛ mɔinmɔin ga ɗa kɛ la,
Kaipa gè la luani nui zɔiti ta-lukpɔɠaaleʋei ʋa.
«Ee, ni nu ɠɛni bɛ̀, nii é woilosu gòoi ma!
nà naa laazu ɠɔma, gè dɔ ùnba eɠɛ masa bɔɔlɔgi.
Nà ʋoluvaawo ma ga nà-kɛɛwotii ɠilagilagiti pɛ,
Ni nà-zooiti ti pèelalani,
ni gè ti-ʋaalɔnɔgiti miini nɔ, gè la ti ɠeyani,
adaʋɛ moloi naa ná, nii é ga ɓeleegi, ɠaingiti ti ʋɔnɔ miná,
